summary: Wicket the Ewok and his friends agree to help two shipwrecked human children, Mace and Cindel, on a quest to find their parents.
cast: Eric Walker|Warwick Davis|Fionnula Flanagan|Guy Boyd|Aubree Miller|Burl Ives|Daniel Frishman|Debbie Lee Carrington|Tony Cox|Kevin Thompson|Margarita Farrell|Pam Grizz|Bobby Bell|Darryl Henriques|Sydney Walker|Nancy Carlin|James Cranna|Hal Rayle|Robert Elross|Pat Franklin|Michael Pritchard|Jon Berg|Tiffany Brissette
title: La aventura de los Ewoks
